Module com.example.c_195
Package DAO

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
DAO.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
This is the Data Access Object class for appointments. All methods that interact with the appointments table are stored in this class.

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments(String filter, String orderBy)
      This method gets all the rows and columns from the apppointments table. Returns them as an observable list. Filter can be passed into the method to change results. orderBy can be passed into the method to change the sorting of the results.
